welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Acheres, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical sites, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights at Paris Cergy Pontoise Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orly Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Orly Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, with seven sub-terminals serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
